item.title: Rick add a quote by H.L. Mencken
item.description: "Faith may be defined briefly as an illogical belief in the occurrence of the improbable." -- H.L. Mencken

item.title: Rick add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Rick add a quote by Kinky Friedman
item.description: "Politics is the only field of human endeavor where the more experience you have, the worse you get." -- Kinky Friedman

item.title: Rick add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Memory is the diary that chronicles things that never happened or couldn't possibly have happened." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Rick add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "You believe in a book that has talking animals, wizards, witches, demons, sticks turning into snakes, burning bushes, food falling from the sky, people walking on water, and all sorts of magical, absurd and primitive stories, and you say that we are the ones that need help?" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rick add a quote by Francis Bacon
item.description: "The root of all superstition is that men observe when a thing hits, but not when it misses." -- Francis Bacon

item.title: Rick add a quote by Stanley Kubrick
item.description: "If you can talk brilliantly about a problem, it can create the consoling illusion that it has been mastered." -- Stanley Kubrick

item.title: Rick add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "There is nothing more exhilarating than to be shot at with no result." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Rick add a quote by G. Gordon Liddy
item.description: "Obviously crime pays, or there'd be no crime." -- G. Gordon Liddy

item.title: Rick add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Women should be obscene and not heard." -- John Lennon

item.title: Rick add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rick add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson
